basic_information.scholarship_name: The Tiffany Wise Master of Public Health Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.scholarship_notes: Can receive full scholarship if they are graduating that semester.
basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a career in public health. Eligibility Requirements Enrolled in the MPH Program at UCO Minimum 2.5 GPA Provide statement outlining a personal or financial struggle and how this scholarship will impact your life Preference will be given to a student actively involved with the Majors Club in KHS Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
